## Bootstrap 5.3 Creating Dropdowns ### Introduction Dropdowns are a common UI element used in web applications to provide a list of options for users to choose from. Bootstrap 5.3 provides a simple and intuitive way to create dropdowns with various styles and functionalities. This documentation will guide you through the process of creating dropdowns using Bootstrap 5.3. ### Objective and Scope The objective of this documentation is to provide step-by-step instructions on how to create dropdowns using Bootstrap 5.3.
